tool_description: The US sales tax rates API provides accurate and up-to-date sales tax in the United States.
name: US Sales Tax Rates
title: US Sales Tax Rates

api_list.name: Health check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-sales-tax-rates.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-sales-tax-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-sales-tax-rates.p.rapidapi.com/tax/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-sales-tax-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
